Package com.example.TaskManagement.service.impl

Interface UserService

All Known Implementing Classes:
DefaultUserService
public interface UserService
Service interface for managing users in the system.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    deleteUser(int userId)
    Deletes a user from the system by their unique ID.
    List<User>
    getAllUsers()
    Retrieves all users from the system.
    User
    getUserById(int userId)
    Retrieves a user by their unique ID.
    User
    saveUser(User user)
    Saves a new user or updates an existing one in the system.
    User
    updateUser(User user)
    Updates an existing user in the system.

  • Method Details

    • getAllUsers

      List<User> getAllUsers()
      Retrieves all users from the system.
      Returns:
      A list of all users.

    • updateUser

      User updateUser(User user)
      Updates an existing user in the system.
      Parameters:
      user - The user object with updated information.
      Returns:
      The updated user.

    • getUserById

      User getUserById(int userId)
      Retrieves a user by their unique ID.
      Parameters:
      userId - The ID of the user to retrieve.
      Returns:
      The user object if found, otherwise null.

    • saveUser

      User saveUser(User user)
      Saves a new user or updates an existing one in the system.
      Parameters:
      user - The user object to save or update.
      Returns:
      The saved or updated user.

    • deleteUser

      void deleteUser(int userId)
      Deletes a user from the system by their unique ID.
      Parameters:
      userId - The ID of the user to delete.
